p:
Chemical components of N. sativa seeds include oil, protein, carbohydrate, and fiber. The fixed oil chemical compositions of N. sativa are linoleic acid, oleic acid, Palmitic acid, Arachidic acid, Eicosadienoic acid, Stearic acid, Linoleic acid and Myristic acid.
30 The major phenolic compounds of N. sativa seeds are p-cymene (37.3%), Thymoquinone (TQ) (13.7%), carvacrol (11.77%), and thymol (0.33%).
